question: What materials would you use for the following operation: Youngswick osteotomy with internal screw fixation of the first right metatarsophalangeal joint of the right foot.
answer: 3-0 Vicryl, 4-0 Vicryl, and two partially threaded cannulated screws from 3.0 OsteoMed System for internal fixation.

question: What materials would you use for the following operation: 1.  Removal of painful hardware, first left metatarsal.,2.  Excision of nonunion, first left metatarsal.,3.  Incorporation of corticocancellous bone graft with internal fixation consisting of screws and plates of the first left metatarsal.
answer: 2-0 Vicryl, 3-0 Vicryl, 4-0 Vicryl, 5-0 Prolene, as well as one corticocancellous allograft consisting of ASIS and one T-type plate prebent with six screw holes and five 3.0 partially threaded cannulated screws and a single 3.0 noncannulated screw from the OsteoMed and Synthes System respectively for the fixation of the bone graft and the plate on the first left metatarsal.

question: What materials would you use for the following operation: Lateral and plantar condylectomy, fifth left metatarsal.

What materials would you use for the following operation: 1.  Austin-Akin bunionectomy with internal screw fixation of the first right metatarsophalangeal joint.,2.  Weil osteotomy with internal screw fixation, first right metatarsal.,3.  Arthroplasty, second right PIP joint.
answer: 3-0 Vicryl, 4-0 Vicryl, 5-0 Prolene, as well as two 16-mm partially treaded cannulated screws of the OsteoMed system, one 18-mm partially treaded cannulated screw of the OsteoMed system of the 3.0 size.  One 10-mm 2.0 partially threaded cannulated screw of the OsteoMed system.

question: What materials would you use for the following operation: Austin bunionectomy with internal screw fixation, first metatarsal, left foot.
answer: 2-0 Vicryl, 3-0 Vicryl, 4-0 Vicryl, as well as a 16-mm and an 18-mm partially threaded cannulated screw from the OsteoMed Screw Fixation System.

question: Would you use screws for the following operation: Youngswick osteotomy with internal screw fixation of the first right metatarsophalangeal joint of the right foot. Yes or no.
Would you use a hemostat in the following operation: Elective male sterilization via bilateral vasectomy. Yes or no.
